trans-unit.source: Represents a group of annotations.
trans-unit.target: 代表註解的群組。

trans-unit.source: The AnnotationGroup class represents a collection of annotations.
trans-unit.target: AnnotationGroup 類別代表附註集合。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to manipulate annotations relative to each other.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別可用來操作相對於彼此的註解。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content alignment of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的內容對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to align text for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> objects, and to align a nonscaled image inside an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageAnnotation> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用來對齊文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation>物件，以及對齊 nonscaled 的映像內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageAnnotation>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ImageAnnotation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.EllipseAnnotation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.RectangleAnnotation> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> value that represents the content alignment of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref>表示註解的內容對齊的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation anchor may be moved with a mouse by the end user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，指定是否可以將註解錨點使用滑鼠移終端使用者。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the annotation anchor may be moved, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果註解錨點可能會移動，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation may be moved with a mouse by the end user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，指定是否可能會將註解以滑鼠移終端使用者。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the annotation may be moved, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果註釋可能會移動，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the points of a polygon annotation may be moved with a mouse by the end user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定是否可能會多邊形註解的點，用滑鼠移動終端使用者的旗標。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the points of the polygon annotation may be moved, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果多邊形註解的點可能會移動，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation may be resized with a mouse by the end user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，指定是否註釋可能會調整的大小與滑鼠終端使用者。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the annotation may be resized, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果註釋可能會調整大小，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation may be selected with a mouse by the end user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定是否可能註解使用滑鼠選取終端使用者的旗標。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the annotation may be selected, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果註釋可能會選擇，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether an annotation's text may be edited when the end user double clicks the text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，指定當使用者按兩下文字時，是否可能編輯註解的文字。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the annotation text may be edited, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果註解可能可編輯的文字，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of annotations in the group.
trans-unit.target: 取得群組中的附註的集合。

trans-unit.source: Note that the coordinates of all annotations in the group are relative to the group annotation.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，群組中所有註解座標相對於群組註解。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationCollection"> </xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 取得註解類型。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to get the name of each annotation type, for example.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用來取得每個註解類型名稱，例如。

trans-unit.source: Line, Rectangle, Ellipse, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 線條、 矩形、 橢圓形、 等等。

trans-unit.source: The annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 註解類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used for the background of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>註解背景使用的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background gradient style of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的背景漸層樣式。

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the gradient, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 兩個色彩用來繪製的漸層<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackSecondaryColor%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackSecondaryColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> value used to draw the background of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"> </xref>用來繪製背景的註解的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatch style of an annotation background.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解背景的影線。

trans-unit.source: Two colors are used to draw the hatching, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackSecondaryColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 兩個色彩用來繪製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackSecondaryColor%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackSecondaryColor%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A>影線

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> value used to draw the background of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"> </xref>用來繪製背景的註解的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color for the background of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解背景次要色彩。

trans-unit.source: A secondary color is used with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A> when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackHatchStyle%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackGradientStyle%2A> are used.
trans-unit.target: 次要色彩用於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A>時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackHatchStyle%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackGradientStyle%2A>可用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackGradientStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackHatchStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationGroup.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>用來繪製背景的影線或漸層填滿的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the chart area to which the annotation is clipped.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要註解所依附之圖表區域的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If a chart area name is specified, the annotation will only be drawn inside the plotting area of that chart area.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定圖表區域名稱，則該圖表區域的繪圖區域內都會只繪製註解。

trans-unit.source: All parts of the annotation outside of the plotting area will be clipped.
trans-unit.target: 將裁剪的註解在繪圖區之外的所有部分。

trans-unit.source: To disable chart area clipping, set this property to <xref:System.Double.NaN> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 若要停用圖表區域依附，請將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Double.NaN>或空字串。</xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that represents the name of an existing chart area.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>表示現有的圖表區域的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 unmanaged 資源並，或者，managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to release both unmanaged and managed resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font to use for the text of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解文字的字型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object used for the text of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>註釋的文字所使用的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text color for an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used for the text color of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值用來註解的文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines if an annotation is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定判斷是否已選取註解的旗標。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the annotation is selected, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果選取的註解，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the size of an annotation is always defined in relative chart coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定是否註解的大小永遠以相對圖表座標定義的旗標。

trans-unit.source: The height and width of an annotation may be set in relative chart or in axes coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 在相對的圖表或軸座標，可能設定的高度和寬度的註解。

trans-unit.source: By default, relative chart coordinates are used.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會使用相對圖表座標。

trans-unit.source: To use axes coordinates, set the IsSizeAlwaysRelative property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用軸座標，IsSizeAlwaysRelative 屬性設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: Then either anchor the annotation to a data point or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 然後請錨定至資料點或設定註解<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AxisX%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Width*> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Height*> of an annotation are always in chart relative coordinates, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果<> *> 和<> *> 註解會永遠以相對座標表示圖表，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line color of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的線條色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw an annotation line.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>用來繪製註解行尾的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line style of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的線條樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> value used to draw an annotation line.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"> </xref>用來繪製註解行尾的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line width, in pixels, of the annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定線條的寬度，以像素的註解。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value defining the width, in pixels, of an annotation line.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>定義寬度，單位為像素註解行尾的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the annotation's shadow.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的陰影色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the shadow of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>值用來繪製註解的陰影。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the annotation's shadow.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的陰影大小。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the offset between an annotation and its shadow.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>表示註解和其陰影之間的位移值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text style of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定註解的文字樣式。

trans-unit.source: A TextStyle enumeration value used to draw the text of an annotation.
trans-unit.target: 用來繪製文字的註解文字樣式列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the annotation is visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定表示註解是否可見的旗標。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the annotation is visible, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果您的註釋不可見，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
